title: Stock Market Simulation & Portfolio Management
description: This is an enhanced C++ application that simulates a live stock market environment with a professional portfolio management system. The application provides real-time stock price fluctuations, comprehensive portfolio tracking, and persistent data storage across sessions.

title: Browser-Forensic-Analyzer_Unsaved_Notepad++_Viewer
description: Windows-focused desktop tool for analyzing Chrome/Edge artifacts, SQLite files, and NTFS metadata with a modern Tkinter GUI.

title: Remote-Health-Monitoring-System
description: RMC2 is a console-based healthcare platform for managing patients, doctors, appointments, IoT sensor snapshots, and EHR updates.
